transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir, Vinod bhai Hanuman baat kar raha hu, IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan, bol raha tha na aapne IndiaMART mein ek aapke number mein call ki thi dekhiye, abhi bhi toh bilkul nahi ho paaya, abhi mein market ke andar woh kaam ke liye aaya hua tha.
Customer: Toh kab karenge?
Executive: Kya nahi kar sakta abhi toh free bilkul hi nahi ho paunga abhi.
Executive: Ji sir important tha isliye Vinod bhai.
Customer: Baaki abhi improve hua service mein? Baaki improve hua service mein?
Executive: Haan service mein toh abhi kya hai saamne se saamne se enquiries vagerah bahut aa rahi hai toh thik hai matlab thik thak hai enquiries vagerah aa rahi hai sab kuch.
Executive: Thik hai matlab badh raha hai na call ka woh enquiries vagerah ka?
Customer: Haan haan enquiries vagerah badh rahi hai.
Executive: Badh rahi hai dhire dhire, wohi cheez dekhiye initial level pe woh challenge hi aata hai Vinod bhai, aap bolenge na woh cheez hai woh highlight karne wala toh dekhiye confirmation lena mera kaam hai, mere ko mera kaam hai aapko guidance dena properly ki aap kaise IndiaMART se business nikal sakte hai, woh kaise kaam karta hai puri cheez.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, deal vagerah close ho gayi hai na ya is month tak ki?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Deal vagerah close hui hai Vinod bhai?
Customer: Haan lead vagerah hui hai do teen lead close hui hai is month.
Executive: Nahi mein puch raha hu deal vagerah bani hai IndiaMART se ya nahi?
Customer: Haan haan do teen bani hai do teen.
Executive: Do teen ho gayi hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Choti choti mili thi ya bulk mein mila tha woh?
Customer: Ek tha bulk ka order baaki toh chote chote kuch 5 ya 10 hazar ke the baaki ek tha jo.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ek tha ek aadmi ka 150 200 ka tha woh ek ek banda tha jo 150 200 hazar se jyada ka tha vagerah.
Executive: Hmm, aur ek cheez aur hai aap follow up bana ke chaliyega kyunki aane wale time mein bhi kaam aayega follow up aapke.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Samajh rahe hai na? Baaki aap mujhe aur review rating jarur kare aap.
Executive: Woh cheez hai na jo maine aapko bataya tha I think review rating ka woh cheez bhi aap karenge buyer se review rating jarur liya kare aur buyer call mat miss kiya kare.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Jo buyer aapne kuch time yeh hafta hua hai buyer ko.
Executive: Is month mein.
Executive: Baaki jaise jaise aap use karenge woh enquiry badhte chala jayega aapka.
Executive: Thik hai Vinod bhai yeh bataye hum kab discuss kar sakte hai kuch cheeze aur points hai jo mein aapko beech mein discuss karna chahta hu.
Customer: Kal karte hai sir kal aap 12:00 baje ke aas pass phone kar dena.
Executive: 12:00 12:00 1:00 baje ke aas pass?
Customer: Haan 12:00 1:00 baje ke aas pass.
Executive: 1:00 baje kar dena chalo 1:00 baje tak free ho jayega.
Customer: 1:00 baje kya bol rahe hai?
Customer: Mein keh raha hu 1:00 baje tak kar dena matlab 1:00 baje ke baad mein aap kabhi bhi karna matlab.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Baaki ek cheez mein yeh dekh raha tha bylead woh jo utha rahe hai na jo maine aapko bataya tha last time.
Customer: Haan bylead vagerah toh.
Executive: Hmm hmm woh aa gaya woh toh.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sun raha hu mein aapko.
Executive: Nahi sir, matlab jyada se jyada isko bracket ko kam se kam 70 to 80 rakhiyega.
Executive: Yeh Vinod bhai isme kya hoga uska always aapke na interested woh follow up badhte chale jayenge.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Kyunki agar woh abhi nahi le raha hai aap se toh aage aane wale time mein nahi lega kyunki market mein woh kahin na kahin connected hai agar woh do teen saal se market mein hai na 5 saal se 1 saal se toh kahin na kahin woh business kar raha hai.
Executive: Is cheez ko understand karke aap yeh na thode ki buyer.
Executive: Mein woh mera jo concern mein aapka yeh bylead aapne uthaya nahi bilkul wapas.
Executive: Isliye bhi mujhe connect karna tha bylead kyun nahi utha rahe Vinod bhai abhi tak?
Customer: Nahi sir do char din abhi kuch byleads vagerah dekhe toh kuch kaam ke aaye nahi the toh phir maine use bhi nahi kare the iska.
Executive: Atleast 7 din ke andar toh consume hona chahiye pichle ek week shuru hua hai aapka confirmation date tha isliye bhi mujhe connect karna tha.
Executive: Kyunki aisa hota hai kuch aise hi matlab useful useful byleads uske andar the nahi toh matlab useful nahi the kuch.
Executive: Dekhiye ek cheez samjhiye Vinod bhai aapka bylead lapse hota hai agar aapko lag raha hai na ki kaam ka bhi nahi aa raha hai thik hai aur relevant hai agar thoda bahut bhi relevant hai na aap usko consume kar lijiye kyunki aapki.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Toh atleast utha ke chhod denge toh bhi kaam ho jayega.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Consume karna aapko us state mein.
Executive: Kal aapko.
Executive: Thik hai Vinod?
Customer: Aapki aapki aawaz kat rahi hai toh aap kal aap 1:00 baje ke baad mein contact karna hai toh thik hai.
Executive: Haan thik hai mein kal 1:00 baje ke jarur connect karta hu.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not utilizing buyleads effectively.

- Customer states buyleads are not useful.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of consuming buyleads.

- Executive advised to follow up with buyers.

- Executive advised to take review ratings from buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow at 1:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, review rating, subscription
